name: Kingler
description: The large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

attacks.name: Heavy Pincers
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Claw Rend
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.
